title: Account Tranfer
body: Well you see here someone got into my account bought 200 dollars of rp and went to a different region now i have to wait till riot responds

replies.body:
It's a bummer to hear that an an unauthorized user gained access to your account, and you did the right thing by reaching out to us.  I was able to confirm that your ticket was received, and our account team will reach out as soon as they can.  They'll be able to assist with both recovery as well as possible reparations.  Our queue is a bit high right now, so it may be a bit for a response.  It's really important not to reply to your ticket until then, otherwise you will fall to the bottom of the queue.  

In the meantime, I suggest going over the [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to secure your information inside and out of League.

Hang tight, and we'll help out!
